pr.name: Public Relations
pr.description: The Public Relations Committee is responsible for creating, managing and implementing the PR strategy of our branch and maintaining a good image in their responsibilities.
Responsibilities: The external communication and the dealing with (speakers, VIPs, media)
Representing the branch in the offline campaigns (such as the booths)
Building Relationships with different communities
Making a wide network of Speakers, VIPs & foundations and building an updated database of them

fr.name: Fundraising Resources
fr.description: The Fundraising Committee develops and implements fundraising strategies and actions upon a planned framework of activities addressing multiple sources of funding in support of all branch activities.
Responsibilities: Ensuring financial resources for our branch.
Analyzing and studying the market for any potential sponsor.
Work hand in hand with the treasurer to help achieve the branch’s financial plan.

hr.name: Human Resources
hr.description: The Human Resources Committee is supposed to maintain a healthy environment for all volunteers within our branch and give a clear image of every volunteer to their heads and the ex-comm
Responsibilities: Maintaining a healthy environment.
Handling volunteer complaints and resolving them.
Interviewing applicants and selecting suitable members.
Preparing detailed profiles of member contributions.

multimedia.name: Multimedia
multimedia.description: The Multimedia Committee is responsible for everything related to media and advertising like posters, photographs, videos, motion graphics, magazines’ designs...etc
Responsibilities: Providing photography and video coverage for events.
Collaborating with the marketing committee to create social media designs and videos.
Requirements:
Having a good grasp of the skills or software needed for his role:
a .Adobe Photoshop is a must for designers and Illustrator is a plus.
b .Adobe premiere or any equivalent software for a video editor and Adobe after effects is a plus.
c .Good eye and his gear for photographers and videographers

sm.name: Social Media & Marketing
sm.description: The Social Media Committee is responsible for everything related to marketing and linking us with different media channels like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn ...etc.
Responsibilities: Writing and publishing press releases across media channels.
Promoting news or events related to the branch.
Collaborating with the multimedia committee to create social media content.

campus.name: Campus
campus.description: Serves departments within the faculty and organizes competitions.
Responsibilities: Helping students
Organizing technical competitions

web.name: Web Development
web.description: The Web Development Committee is responsible for launching, developing, and maintaining our website
Responsibilities: Troubleshooting website problems.
Monitoring website traffic.
Staying up-to-date with technology.
Maintaining and updating the website.
